title: Has Congress approved a bill allowing the Government to subject citizens with "mental disabilities" to microchips?
subtitle: The unreliable web sites claimed that H.R. 4919, the House of Representatives Bill, passed in December 2016, would allow microscopic austerity of American citizens for tracing purposes.
author: David Emery
vclaim: (HR) 4919, passed on December 8, 2016, allows microscopic drinking of citizens "mentally disabled" such as autistic patients and Alzheimer's disease.
